attributes.action: License the construction of a statue of Bruce Forsyth in Trafalgar Square
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bruce Forsyth has been at the forefront of televised light entertainment since the medium's fledgling days through to the very present. As one of London's favourite sons, it is only right that an effigy of him in his famous 'Thinker' pose occupy the vacant 'Fourth Plinth' at Trafalgar Square.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
